# isRulerVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that controls whether the scroll view enclosing text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager displays the ruler.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isRulerVisible: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to show the ruler, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to hide the ruler. By default, the ruler is hidden.

## Related Documentation

- **toggleRuler(_:)**: This action method shows or hides the ruler, if the receiver is enclosed in a scroll view.

## Using text formatting controls

- **usesRuler**: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager use a ruler.
- **usesInspectorBar**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this text view uses the inspector bar.
